thread.title: Faith Dingle sets out to destroy Kerry's custody of Kyle in Emmerdale | Metro News
thread.title_full: Faith Dingle sets out to destroy Kerry's custody of Kyle in Emmerdale | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Faith Dingle sets out to destroy Kerry's custody of Kyle in Emmerdale | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 11:58 pm (Picture: ITV) 
Kerry Wyatt could be set to make a new Emmerdale nemesis as Faith Dingle sets out to scupper her chances of full custody of Kyle – but will her intervention succeed and, if so, where will Kyle end up? 
Faith feels partially responsible when Zak and Lisa ruin their chances of having Kyle at home with them. When Faith continues to flirt with Zak, Lisa accuses them of being up to no good at her birthday party and the showdown is witnessed by Kyle’s welfare officer, Linda. 
As Linda begins to question the capabilities of the Dingles as Kyle’s guardians, Zak goes on to make some bold statements which prompts Linda to instead ask Kerry and her partner Dan Spencer to take Kyle. (Picture: ITV) 
But while Kerry and Dan are thrilled, Faith decides to step in – especially after hearing about Kerry’s past. 
Taking Linda aside, Faith has some words about Kerry – but will they be enough to stop Kerry’s custody dreams from coming true? 
One to watch: Thursday 16th February on ITV at 8pm.
